Desc.entry: Aims to collect the recorded memories of people living and/or working in Dore throughout the 20th and early 21st Centuries. Project called 'Dore Voices'. Building up an archive of recordings, transcripts, some written reminiscences and photographs. Have started with the most elderly but moving down the age range to include children. This new project will be called 'Dore Young Voices'. Shares findings with the local community through open days, exhibitions and publications, as well as giving talks to other interested groups in the Sheffield area. Welcomes new members of any age.

Pubs.entry: The Time of Our Lives - Dore at War; Dore Old School in Records and Recollections - John Dunston

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Once or twice per month either afternoon or evening. Once or twice per year (open days)
